Package pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprojectile

Class Bubble

java.lang.Object
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.strategy.Gravity
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprojectile.Projectile
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprojectile.HeroProjectile
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprojectile.Bubble
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject
public class Bubble extends HeroProjectile
The Bubble class handles everything with the mHero's special ability, named the bubble. It begins at the hero, and grows covering the whole screen. Once it collides with an enemy, that enemy is bubbled.
Author:
YuyanZhou
